text: Cercosaura ocellata, the ocellated tegu, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Brazil , Venezuela, Guyana, Suriname, French Guiana, Peru, Bolivia, Colombia, Argentina, and Paraguay. ==References== Category:Cercosaura Category:Reptiles described in 1830 Category:Taxa named by Johann Georg Wagler
title: Cercosaura ocellata
